de.mrapp.android.dialog.model

Interface EditTextDialogDecorator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dialog, de.mrapp.android.validation.Validateable<java.lang.CharSequence>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditTextDialog, EditTextDialogDecorator

    public interface EditTextDialogDecorator
extends Dialog, de.mrapp.android.validation.Validateable<java.lang.CharSequence>
    Defines the interface, a decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and contains an EditText widget.
    Since:
    5.1.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface de.mrapp.android.dialog.model.Dialog

        Dialog.Gravity

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface de.mrapp.android.dialog.model.Dialog

        MATCH_PARENT, WRAP_CONTENT
